reference.shortdesc: The subjectHeadMeta element enables a navigation title and short description to be associated with a subject heading.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The subjectHeadMeta element is specialized from topicmeta. It is defined in the subject scheme module.

example.title: Example
example.p: In the following code sample, the subjectHeadMeta element contains a navtitle element that provides a label for the group of subjects:
